pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creates an Executable Shortcut for Shiny Applications // Provides function shinyShortcut() that, when given the base directory of a shiny application, will produce an executable file that runs the shiny app directly in the user's default browser. Tested on both windows and unix machines. Inspired by and borrowing from http://www.mango-solutions.com/wp/2017/03/shiny-based-tablet- or-desktop-app/.
